node.doctext:
This is where you can create a new node. Just type in the title you want and click the button. Please make sure that you've searched for it a few times and a few different ways first. You might already find what you're looking for. Check out the [Everything FAQ] if you're a little lost.

[% my $str; return "Sorry, in order to create a node you have to [login] or [create a new user]" if getId($USER) == $HTMLVARS{guest_user}; my $newNodeName = $query->param("newNodeName"); $newNodeName = "" if (!defined $newNodeName); $str.= $query->startform ."Node name: "; $str .= $query->textfield(-name => "node", -default => $newNodeName, -size => 50, -maxlength => 100) . "\n"; $str .= "\n"; $str .= "\n"; $str .= "\n"; $str .= $query->submit("createit", "Create it!") . "\n"; $str .= $query->endform; $str; %]
node.title: Create a node
